short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to add functionality to the Splinterlands game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Splinterlands Battle Notes extension installs the Battle Notes tool at the bottom of every Splinterlands page. At the click of a button, call up all the notes you wrote to yourself, every team idea you ever had, for every ruleset. Get the winning edge by making it easy to put together a top notch team every time.
